Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 71st/Lawndale
ShortDescription: Westbound #67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, due to street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/LaSalle
ShortDescription: #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Wentworth, 59th, State, then resume their normal route at 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Wentworth, 59th, State, then resume their normal route at 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/LaSalle.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison, #56 Milwaukee & #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Washington/LaSalle
ShortDescription: Eastbound 20 Madison, # Milwaukee & 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle, Madison, due to a Parade near Washington/LaSalle

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #20 Madison, #56 Milwaukee & #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle, and Madison, then resume their normal route, due to a Parade near Washington/LaSalle.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: # 124 Navy Pier Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Washington/LaSalle
ShortDescription: Eastbound # 124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle, Dearborn, Illinois and Columbus, due to a Parade near Washington/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound # 124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle, Dearborn, Illinois and Columbus, then resume their normal route, due to a Parade near Washington/LaSalle.

Headline: J14 Jeffrey Jump Temporary Reroute near Washington/LaSalle
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffrey Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to a parade near Washington/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
J14 Jeffrey Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to a parade near Washington/LaSalle.

Southbound buses will operate via Washington, LaSalle, Adams, Clinton, Harris and  Balbo then resume their normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via Balbo, Michigan, Harrison, Randolph and Washington then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Forest Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Forest Park due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are standing near Forest Park due to a mechanical problem.

At this time, consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
